document_data.name: Tyjit Skesh
document_data.mainbody: '''Tyjit Skesh''' was a guard on the [[Sword Coast]] just before the [[Tyranny of Dragons]].
document_data.Personality: Tyjit was quick to anger and quicker to use her two blades, but was also honest to a fault. She did not tolerate bullying, and always explained the cause of her anger in the hopes that people's attitude would change.
document_data.History: At the start of the [[Tyranny of Dragons]] inÂ [[1489 DR]] Tyjit acted as a guard for a great caravan that, unbeknownst to her, was full of agents of the [[Cult of the Dragon]] transporting treasures for the [[Hoard of the Dragon Queen]].
